name: Doom Regina Archfiend
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
You can target 1 "Archfiend" Spell/Trap in your GY or banishment; destroy this card, and if you do, add the targeted card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Doom Regina Archfiend" once per turn.

[ Monster Effect ] 
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Throne of the Archfiends". Must be Ritual Summoned. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can destroy as many Spells/Traps your opponent controls as possible, then if this card is in the Extra Monster Zone, you can banish all Spells and Traps from your opponent's GY. You can only use this effect of "Doom Regina Archfiend" once per turn. Unaffected by other monsters' effects while in the Extra Monster Zone.
